{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3161662,"name":"alperenyurt","username":"Alperen","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/alperen/{size}/244472_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-10T14:20:46.361Z","cooked":"

Hi!

As you know, last two years nearly all teams bought swerve modules. We also tried, too. Last year we had big problems with delivery and we gave up buying swerve.

After our last regional event, we made r&d and started to build our swerve modules in our workshop with our possibilities.

Firstly we made aluminium parts.(you can find the production videos in our instagram:

https://www.instagram.com/p/CeEtqDMoCYr/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link
https://www.instagram.com/p/CezEYJ2opmO/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link
https://www.instagram.com/p/ChH0InjIyrH/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.14899√ó1599 86.7 KB

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.15899√ó1599 137 KB

√∂opjmoƒ±√∂899√ó1599 97.9 KB

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.22899√ó1599 88.8 KB

processed main body part on a lathe, then sent to factory for theets

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.13899√ó1599 75.8 KB

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.27.441125√ó2000 228 KB

Finally we started the mounting our modules.

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.27.392048√ó1895 245 KB

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.36899√ó1599 112 KB

elime almƒ±≈üƒ±m899√ó1599 67.5 KB

motorlarƒ±n montajƒ±899√ó1599 127 KB

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.34899√ó1599 179 KB

muntajlƒ± ≈üase1599√ó899 163 KB

Finally, we mounted all the components and created the module.

Our drivetrain is 13,3Kg (29,32lbs) without electroniccomponents / 17,7kg(39,02lbs) with electronic components.

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.37900√ó1600 165 KB

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 16.08.38922√ó2000 204 KB

We tested systems. In first tries the drivetrain was not working field orianted but we solved this after some changes.

And this is our showcase video:

Very nice!

With spiral bevel gears, is there a difference in rotating the wheels forwards vs backwards?

@AriMB Our tires turning only one direction.When we want to go opposite way the tires are turning 180 degrees and start spinning same direction. You can see it our showcase video. (second 0.48*)

You might want to change this to improve responsiveness. Reversing the drive is faster than spinning the whole module (usually)

But otherwise, looks good.

Just wondering, what advantages were realized with this choice?

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2023-03-10T16:57:10.847Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":189,"readers_count":188,"score":42.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":429703,"topic_slug":"custom-swerve-drive-by-6948","display_username":"Drakxii","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":53505,"username":"Alperen","name":"alperenyurt","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/alperen/{size}/244472_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":23134,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2582/5941 Mentor, CSA, and RI "},"post_url":"/t/custom-swerve-drive-by-6948/429703/7","custom_user_title":"2582/5941 Mentor, CSA, and RI ","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3161789,"name":"Ari Meles-Braverman","username":"AriMB","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/arimb/{size}/189989_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-10T17:04:15.183Z","cooked":"

The problem is spiral bevel gears usually work much better in one direction than the other. To a point where some may not even be able to spin the other direction. That‚Äôs why most COTS swerves use straight bevel gears.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2023-03-10T17:04:15.183Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":173,"readers_count":172,"score":39.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":429703,"topic_slug":"custom-swerve-drive-by-6948","display_username":"Ari Meles-Braverman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":4297,"username":"Andrew_Schreiber","name":"Andrew Schreiber","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew_schreiber/{size}/209563_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25012,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FIRST Israel CSA, FRC 5987/5951 Technical Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/custom-swerve-drive-by-6948/429703/8","custom_user_title":"FIRST Israel CSA, FRC 5987/5951 Technical Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3161794,"name":"Andrew Schreiber","username":"Andrew_Schreiber","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew_schreiber/{size}/209563_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-10T17:14:04.435Z","cooked":"

Ah, boo.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2023-03-10T17:14:04.435Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":160,"readers_count":159,"score":37.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":429703,"topic_slug":"custom-swerve-drive-by-6948","display_username":"Andrew Schreiber","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":25012,"username":"AriMB","name":"Ari Meles-Braverman","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/arimb/{size}/189989_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4297,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"I'm Retired"},"post_url":"/t/custom-swerve-drive-by-6948/429703/9","custom_user_title":"I'm Retired","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3161799,"name":"alperenyurt","username":"Alperen","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/alperen/{size}/244472_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-10T17:23:40.133Z","cooked":"

@Andrew_Schreiber @AriMB @Drakxii

Spiral bevel gears give us a better grip.

And we haven‚Äôt got a problem with this gears.They are working very well.

We love customizations. Example we made our tires.

WhatsApp G√∂rsel 2023-03-10 saat 20.29.27737√ó1600 109 KB

We are using these tires for three months now and we still don‚Äôt need to replace them because they still look good. These tires have 2 nice advantages:

  1. excellent grip (especially on the ramp)

  2. we don‚Äôt need to replace for very long time
